name: Don't Pee Urself
description:
Don't Pee Urself

Made by  Quby Animates and Llama Gaming for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. 

If you're playing this, thanks.

This is a parody of Five Nights At Freddy's with all the art being made in MS paint.

Before you ask, yes, it is beatable. If your struggling, change the difficulty in the settings. :)

Tips for Beginners

-Clean the toilets

-You don't have to do anything to pee, just go in the toilet and wait.

-If you close the door, you can't go pee.

We recommend not reading past this point unless you are really struggling. Part of the game is figuring out how to beat each threat. Only read on if you ABSOLUTLEY HAVE TO!

Charaters (And how to beat them(if you're struggling , of course))

-Cursed Spongy : He will occasionally leave the Beeg Rom to use your toilet. Don't go in there whilst he's in there.

-Sonj : He comes from the left hall. Close the door when he's there to get him to leave.

-Fak U : He resides in the Toilets and will attack if it is not cleaned.

-Jam: He comes from the left hall. Close the door when he's there to get him to leave. If he gets in, he'll block your toilet.
